channel.title: Tsukiball
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Tsukiball" - What exactly is Tsukiball?

item.title: Re: Tsukiball
item.content:encoded: As in, every time you play your have X% chance of leveling up. X starts somewhat high, but decreases the higher level you get. I don't believe the chances of you leveling are at all related to your score.

item.title: Re: Tsukiball
item.content:encoded: I said 5 stats because I was counting Tsuki since I thought it was a stat. You level randomly? As in, when one of the balls roll into a specific hole?

item.title: Re: Tsukiball
item.content:encoded:
Tsukiball levels aren't related to normal stats. They're separate and only show up when you're playing Tsukiball. There is no "Tsuki AP;" you just level up randomly. The levels nothing to do with missions.

Also, there are 4 stats, not 5. Genjutsu, Ninjutsu, Taijutsu, and Doujutsu.

item.title: Re: Tsukiball
item.content:encoded: Hold up though, it says that your level increases as you play Tsukiball and I saw an item on the item list that gives you +5 Tsukiball levels, so how does that work out with 5 stats overall? Are there more than 5 BvS stats that I don't know of yet? Also, could someone please try and explain the points and the XP and AP that you get from Tsukiball?

item.title: Re: Tsukiball
item.content:encoded:
It's a Party House thing. It automatically shows up when you hit Season 3.

Sascha started looping a little over a week ago.

item.title: Tsukiball
item.content:encoded: O-k now, I've already read the thread and the prizes you get for it but I don't know if it's a Party House thing, or if it's unlocked by a Special Mission. Also, since when did the item Sascha loop, since last I checked not counting today of course, it does loop now.
